attributes.review: This app continuously crashed and overheated my phone, DO NOT DOWNLOAD, your phone WILL overheat and it crashes every single time. Also I find Donald Trump to be a disgusting pig, racist, fascist, and being stupid. Oh btw he was in a sex ring... look it up it’s true.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and right when i opened it, i was TRAUMATIZED. never have i ever seen something so scary. there was this orange looking creature who popped up on the screen and now i will have nightmares for life.
attributes.title: will give you nightmares

attributes.review: The app was downloaded for him but the app is broken. When I opened the app, it was all glitches out. It made my phone overheat. I just couldn’t use my phone for hours.
attributes.title: Lag

attributes.review: hi all, i downloaded this app with VERY high expectations for my president, but of course i was let down. this app is nothing but trash. i couldn’t navigate around the app and it’s very obviously a stupid thing to support.
attributes.title: this app is the worst.

attributes.review: I thought this app was serious but it’s just a joke made by some prankster trying to make people think this app was by trump and they try to portray trump as a terrible human being but he’s actually a great man
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: The app doesn’t function properly and I don’t support that it’s run by a racist pig this app is very disgusting and should we delete it it’s horrible disgusting and it’s probably stealing our information ❤️
attributes.title: very bad❤️

attributes.review: I tried to open it and it just kept crashing. Wanted news and information but instead got a horrible app with nothing redeemable about it whatsoever. DO BETTER 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: Terrible!!!!

attributes.review: It CONSTANTLY made my phone crash, I waited a day to see if it would work again after a little while but Even that didn’t do a thing.
attributes.title: An actual review

attributes.review: Literally stop messing around with our apps and focus on the country right now there are bigger problems then your rally’s being empty. Focus on the pandemic and national matters not what TikTok does to you. You’re a grown man grow up for gods sake.
attributes.title: Stop

attributes.review: Trump needs to UNBAN tiktok ... he’s mad because not many people came to his rally but who cares tbh 😂 but anyways he’s banning it also because he knows we make fun of him but when he bans the app he has gen z who will literally DESTROY him so think twice trump 🙃
attributes.title: Tiktok 💕✨
